title: Maximally AI Shipathon
tagline: 48-hour global hackathon for the curious, the chaotic, and the creative
description: Build something real in 48 hours. Whether you're a coder, artist, student, or first-time builder ‚Äî if you're excited about AI, this is your playground.
longDescription:
üß† **Maximally AI Shipathon** is a **48-hour global hackathon** for the curious, the chaotic, and the creative. Whether you're a coder, artist, student, or first-time builder ‚Äî if you're excited about AI and want to build something real, this event is for you.

No pitch decks. No suits. Just ideas, friends, and a playground where *weird is welcome*.

üéØ **Who It's For:**
‚Ä¢ First-time builders
‚Ä¢ No-code makers & indie hackers
‚Ä¢ AI-curious designers, writers, musicians
‚Ä¢ Students & creators of all kinds

**No experience needed.** Just bring energy and ideas.

criteria.name: Execution
criteria.description: Does it work or at least demo clearly?

criteria.name: Beginner Spirit
criteria.description: Bonus for first-timers or clever hacks

whyJoin: üéØ Build anything AI-powered - code, no-code, or prompt your way through
üöÄ First-time builders welcome - no experience needed, just energy and ideas
üé® Three awesome tracks: Build, Create, or Experiment with AI
üõ†Ô∏è Use any tools - from OpenAI to Glide, RunwayML to Replit
üåç Join a global playground where weird is welcome and creativity wins

gallery.caption: Official promo - Build fast, ship smarter
From agents to art - see what you can create
A playground where weird is welcome

prizes.title: Most Creative Build
prizes.description: For the most original and unexpected creation

prizes.title: Best First-Timer
prizes.description: For outstanding work by a first-time builder

prizes.title: Build Champions
prizes.description: Best agents, bots, tools, or automations

prizes.title: Creative Masters
prizes.description: Best art, music, video, or design

timeline.title: Shipathon Begins!
timeline.description: Start building - registration on Devpost, join Discord

timeline.title: Build Sessions
timeline.description: Workshop on AI tools and no-code solutions

timeline.title: Community Check-in
timeline.description: Share progress and get feedback in Discord

timeline.title: Final Push
timeline.description: Last 6 hours - time to polish and submit

timeline.title: Submissions Close
timeline.description: Final deadline - submit your project on Devpost

timeline.title: Judging Period
timeline.description: Judges review and evaluate all submissions

timeline.title: Winners Announced
timeline.description: Top projects featured and winners celebrated

rules: Teams of 1-4 builders - solo builders welcome too
No prebuilt projects - all builds must start after Aug 30, 12:00 AM IST
Project must be safe, respectful, and follow our code of conduct
Must join Discord to qualify for prizes
You can use any AI APIs, frameworks, and existing tools/services
Submit on Devpost by Sept 1, 12:00 AM IST
Demo video (max 2 mins) and working link/repo required

eligibility.age: Global, all ages, all skill levels
eligibility.ipPolicy: Teams retain full ownership of their projects

faqs.question: What's the difference between this and a regular hackathon?
faqs.answer: This is a shipathon focused on building real AI-powered projects! Whether you code, no-code, or prompt your way through - it's all about creativity and making something that works. Weird is welcome!

faqs.question: Do I need AI experience to participate?
faqs.answer: Not at all! We welcome first-time builders, no-code makers, AI-curious designers, writers, musicians, and creators of all kinds. No experience needed - just bring energy and ideas.

faqs.question: What can I build in the tracks?
faqs.answer: üõ†Ô∏è Build with AI: agents, bots, tools, extensions, automations. üé® Create with AI: art, music, video, design, memes. üß™ Experiment with AI: pranks, simulations, hacks, weird stuff!

faqs.question: What tools can I use?
faqs.answer: Anything! No-code tools like Glide, Bubble, Zapier. AI tools like OpenAI, RunwayML, ElevenLabs. Dev tools like Replit, GitHub, Vercel. Use whatever helps you build faster.

faqs.question: How do I submit my project?
faqs.answer: Submit on Devpost by Sept 1, 12:00 AM IST. Include: demo video (max 2 mins), short write-up of what you built and how AI was used, plus a working link or GitHub repo.

title: Web3 Builder Fest
description: Create the next generation of decentralized applications and tools.
longDescription: A 72-hour marathon focused on building innovative Web3 solutions, DeFi protocols, and decentralized applications that will shape the future of the internet.

title: Climate Tech Sprint
description: Develop innovative solutions to combat climate change and promote sustainability.
longDescription: A weekend hackathon dedicated to building technology solutions that address environmental challenges and promote sustainable development.

title: Mobile Innovation Day
description: Create groundbreaking mobile apps that enhance user experiences.
longDescription: A fast-paced 24-hour mobile development challenge focused on creating innovative apps with exceptional user experiences.

title: HealthTech Breakthrough
description: Revolutionize healthcare with innovative technology solutions.
longDescription: A 48-hour hackathon focused on developing healthcare technology that improves patient outcomes and accessibility.

title: University Code Challenge
description: Students showcase their coding skills in this competitive challenge.
longDescription: An exclusive 36-hour coding competition for university students to demonstrate their programming abilities and innovative thinking.
